did.head: Descriptive Summary

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions

University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: World War I Photographs, 1918-1919, Accession # 11502, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia, Charlottesville, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists chiefly of panoramic photographs of World War soldiers who trained in Virginia and various aeronautical and medical units.

did.unittitle: Headquarters Co., 8th U.S. Infantry, Brest, France / Thompson Illustrograph Co. Petersburg, Va., #7185 n.d.

29th Division in a park in Roanoke, Virginia ca. 1918
Signal School, Company 707, Norfolk Naval Base 1918, Jul. 11
606th regiment of engineers Camp A.A. Humphries, Virginia. Photographer, H.H. Lindsey, Washington, D.C. 1918, Oct.
Company C, 130th Machine gun battalion. Photographer, Holladay, Newport News, Virginia 1919, [May] 28
314th Artillery, Company A. Photographer, Erving, Inc. n.d.
Medical officers, Base Hospital, Camp Bowie, Texas. 1918

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Men are numbered and identified by name
